chapter.title: Port to safe read/write
chapter.para: The AgsPort object may contain primitive types as well objects. The read/write operations are generally done by atomic operations. There exists interfacing AgsTaskThread functions but not used, for now. Representing objects should implement AgsPortletInterface.

sect1.title: Portlet interface safe read/write properties
sect1.para: The AgsPortletInterface is used where a GObject is represented by the assigned port. The implemententing class is responsible for thread safe get/set properties. Most common way is using mutices.
